entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:52 AM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023
